What is your favorite day of the week?

Saturday! No school just being at home and being able to relax without stupid teachers yelling at you or something stupid like that...also a great time for me to work on things that we cant do at school. emoticon_rolleyes

Sunday. It's the only day I can really relax.
ghettocracka

sunday would rule, but then you have the voice inside of your head going, XXXX monday is tommorow
 
 and for us procrastinators in school, everything due on monday gets put off until sunday, so sunday isnt my fav
 
 friday and saturday rule, so many people dont go to class on friday so teachers go slack on you, then after the few hours you have class its heaven until sunday when you have to catch up on your work
 
 i dont have a care in the world on fri, sat its hanging out and video games all day
debategirl88

this week is spring break for me. YEAH! But its all most over :xbanghead. I hate school, Im failing right now. I think Im going back in the 9th grade. My parents said there not going to send me to summer school. I went 2ce. Im just not good at it. I have never been held back before and its to late to bring up my grades with the way they are so I guess I am. We are getting our report cards friday next week or is it Monday. AAAAHHHHHH!!!
 I still get woopins!!
Middle

I vote that saturday is the best day of the week, probably for the same reasons as GhettoCracka (did I spell that right?). School work is done on Sunday, so Saturday is a fun day! You have all day to do fun things....kyaking, camping...washing cars...taking sun naps...etc. I could go on. We actually don't get spring break this year...we had too many snow days!! oh, well, at least we still get weekends ;)

I wish we had snow in florida, but NOOOOO we have to be the sunshine state! I haven't seen snow since i was 8 months old.

I have one a(in Bible) a d (in algebra, I HATE MATH!!) and f's in English, economics, science, and band but thats because I don't turn in my "practice time". Its a stupid little card that my mom has to sign saying I practised for 2 hrs every week. emoticon_angry emoticon_angry 
 
 Oh, and a B in P.E.

Neither of you like math? :) I love math...it's the satisfaction that you get from solving the puzzle that makes me happy. It's kinda like I feel when I do latin. What is IB?

I hate saturday because all my money is gone! just kidding! Ghetto I agree that all you do on Sunday is get mad that the weekend is over and get scared because monday will be there when you wake up.

i am great in english... in college, i plan on minoring in either english or creative writing. e-mail me if you need help in writing... and don't give me those stupid sentence diagrams; i hate thos epointless things.
 
 hmmm, math... can't say i enjoy that... math is what is stoping me from getting the honor roll. "A, B, A, B, C" oh well. i only like math when i understand it... i understiid algebra, geometry, algebra 2, but then i took calculus... to me, the definition of calculus is: ASSUMED ANSWERS. anyway...
 
 my favorite day of the week would have to be saturday. why? because i fall into peer pressure. also, young people view it as THE best day, because it is in the middle of the weekend. friday is good too, but i need time to recoup from the tragedies of school.
 
 although i do enjoy sunday... i don;t cram on sunday, i'm worse. i do it all in homeroom, or in earlier classes... hey, it works for me. ;)

im taking algebra this year and i had to take it last year too but i'm taking again this year cause i used to go to a real country school and my algebra teacher sucked even though he was really nice and funny. I HATE ALGEBRA THOUGH! i do ok in school. right now i think that i have all A's and one B. the b is in algebra. told you i suck! i really like english but my teacher hates me so i'm sorta stuck! neone know ne "get the teacher on your good side" tips?emoticon_xgood if you could tell me that would be awesome! thanxemoticon_xchicken sorry i just really wanted to put that one on! it's sooooooooooooooo cute!emoticon_smile

I would have to say the Friday is the best because you come home from school and there is no homework. The fact at thinking about the weekend ahead of me makes me excited too. emoticon_xbouncer emoticon_xbouncer

Friday is the best u can go home with a friend and chill, then wake up saturday knowing u have 1 and a half days left.

yes half a day for girls for guy a lot of times its a day and 2/3 
 
 but for girls we wake up about noon lol
LovetheSouth

Hum......... my favorite day would probably be Friday. I don't have ANY of those problems y'all are talking about. CUZ I'M HOMESCHOOLED< AND WE ROCK. Lol. Anyway, I don't cram, sometimes I do work extra on Saturday, but that's just cuz I wanna get done with my algebra book. I hate algebra with my entire being. Friday's cool though cuz you work the whole day knowing that the next day's Saturday and you don't have anything to do unless you want to, and if it's sunny and the windows are open it just exhilarates you and you work harder. Ok, I do, y'all probly don't. I never met any public-schooled anyone who worked extra or enjoyed any work at any time. I like English, but I don't do it. I took the ACT this year, though (I'm in ninth grade, going into tenth) and I got in the 90%s, so that's pretty cool. English and reading are FUN FUN FUN. emoticon_cool
LovetheSouth
Oh yeah, just a note: Weekdays are for working.... Saturdays are for getting up early and squeezing in as much fun as possible in 24 hours.... Sunday is for church. emoticon_cool
